title: Crypto Lawyer Deaton Phone Hacked, False $LAW Token Announcement Made
description:
The phone of prominent crypto advocate John Deaton was hacked. The compromised phone falsely unveiled $LAW as an official token of CryptoLawUS. Users are urged to disregard the fraudulent announcement and await official updates. In a shocking turn of events, prominent crypto advocate John Deaton’s phone has been hacked, leading to a false token announcement […]
